faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about solar energy

items.question: How much can I save with solar panels?
items.answer: Most homeowners save 60-80% on their electricity bills. With current government subsidies up to ₹78,000, the payback period is typically 4-6 years.

items.question: What government subsidies are available?
items.answer: Under PM Surya Ghar Muft Bijli Yojana, you can get ₹30,000 for 1kW, ₹60,000 for 2kW, and ₹78,000 for 3kW systems. We handle all subsidy paperwork.

items.question: What's the difference between on-grid and off-grid systems?
items.answer: On-grid systems connect to the electricity grid and allow net metering. Off-grid systems work independently with battery storage. Hybrid systems combine both benefits.

items.question: How long do solar panels last?
items.answer: Our solar panels come with 25-year performance warranties and typically last 25-30 years with minimal maintenance.

items.question: What maintenance is required?
items.answer: Solar panels require minimal maintenance - just regular cleaning and annual inspections. We provide comprehensive maintenance packages.

items.question: How long does installation take?
items.answer: Residential installations typically take 1-3 days. Commercial projects may take 1-2 weeks depending on system size.
